segments.text: This whole scene feels like it's on the verge of collapsing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is still gushing water, creating a wide, slick puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spreading across the floor, threatening to make everything slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm so afraid someone is going to slip and fall very badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the mess, the potential for broken bones or broken dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the boy, reaching for cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His stool is clearly unstable; it's practically begging to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could come crashing down, along with the cookie jar and the plate he holds.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The image of him falling fills me with dread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman, still placidly polishing her plate, is unaware of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s truly a perfect storm of potential domestic disasters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The waste of water is also quite disgusting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could intervene and prevent these accidents from happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s such a shame that a simple kitchen task is turning into this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tranquility of the garden outside makes the situation inside even more tense.
segments.speaker: PAR
